paper_title: Deep learning accelerated phase prediction of refractory multi-principal element alloys

claims.claim: Upon training on Ti-free alloys, the MLP achieves an exact-match accuracy of 0.26 when evaluated on Ti alloys that exhibit simultaneous BCC, B2, and Laves phases
instruction: The notebook loads the trained MLP model and the testing dataset
It will filter test samples whose ground-truth labels indicate the simultaneous presence of BCC, B2, and Laves phases, and predicts their phase labels
It will then compute the exact-match accuracy, defined as the fraction of samples for which the predicted phase-presence vector exactly matches the ground truth
Verify that the printed accuracy is around 0.26
